component.name: Kiln AI
component.summary: Rapid AI Prototyping and Dataset Collaboration Tool

description.p: Kiln AI is a comprehensive platform for AI development that makes it easy to prototype, fine-tune, and collaborate on AI models and datasets.

ul.li: Intuitive desktop apps for Windows, macOS, and Linux with truly intuitive design
Zero-code fine-tuning for Llama, GPT-4o, and more with automatic serverless deployment
State-of-the-art model evaluation tools to assess quality
Interactive visual tooling for synthetic data generation
Train or distill your own custom reasoning models
Git-based version control for AI datasets with team collaboration
Automatic prompt generation including chain-of-thought and few-shot
Wide model support via Ollama, OpenAI, OpenRouter, Fireworks, Groq, AWS, and more
Privacy-first design - your data stays private
Build AI tasks that work with structured JSON data

description.p: The Kiln desktop app is completely free and includes both an open-source Python library and OpenAPI REST API under MIT license.
